title: Seven Wonders of the Modern World
description: Seven Wonders of the Modern World is an informational book that describes seven remarkable structures made by humans. Readers will learn why the structures were built and why each has been designated a "wonder." Photographs and illustrations support the informative text
highFrequencyWords: engineers, hydroelectric plant, landmark, observation deck, power plant, radio and television signals, scholars, shipping industry, skyline, suspension bridge, waterway, wildlife habitats
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Capitalization                : Capitalize place names and other proper nouns
awareness: Content Vocabulary                : Identify syllable division in content vocabulary
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
